name: Oops All Rhythm
description:
A turn-based rhythm game. 

Enemies will attack with their rhythms, then you attack with your rhythm. 

There are 100 rooms in ascending difficulty;  approx. 1-2 hours to complete.

All but a few of the rhythms are based on a piece of music, recognizing them is a sort of meta-game. 

Can be played with just the arrow keys. Z can be used to jump or input if prefered.  Tab will fast forward the game.

O and P jump one room backwards or forwards. 5 skips 5 rooms ahead. Backspace ends fights.
